TopicTitle: Trying to revive bd armory fps

Articles.Content:
I have a dream, a crack team of duna marines loading up into their drop pods and hitting laythes atmosphere streaking in to their objective, invaders from kerbin who attacked to prevent laythe independence.  With a roar and and ablaze with light the retro rockets fire, bringing the pods to a fast and controlled landing.  Commander  Jebediah  And his trusty master  sergeant  Bill, burst out of the pod, m16s making short work of the robotic  monstrosities  Sent to do kerbins dirty work. The  Battle was fierce but short And through jebediah’s skillful leadership no brave duna space marine lost during the conflict. With a firm hand shake president Val thanks each brave marine before they head back to their orbiting destroyer, the sands of liberty, once onboard its plasma engines fire up, another fight for justice and liberty calling upon these brave marines.

 

to make this dream happen I am trying to figure out how to get first person shooter working again.

In science mod the gun models do show up, but do not appear in either bd armory or kis. I don’t know how I can get them to work with FPS, so I need some help

 

help me learn to code.
As this seems to be about a mod, rather than KSP 2, moving to add-on discussions.

33 minutes ago, Gargamel said:

As this seems to be about a mod, rather than KSP 2, moving to add-on discussions. 

Thank you

20 hours ago, Commander Valhallion said:

help me learn to code.

 

I believe the KSP Wiki has a ton of stuff related to modding, try checking those out!
